column5: Just a heads up the Silver Bass are in thick Now at the Lower Grand River  Dunnville Dam  ;D Twisters Tails Tipped with small Sinners And a Bobber Split Shot and Minnow are Keys to Catching Lots Have a Great Long Weekend Fishmaster
They'll be my target on sunday! Hopefully they are running here as well.
Let you know tomorrow .... People are camped all over town waiting to attack the Silver tomorrow morning .... The launch in Sturgeon Falls will be a 3 ring circus tomorrow morning
I won't be fishing sturgeon  people go white bass crazy out there
The dam in Dunnville will also be a zoo.
It already is a Circus ... The even have a campfire going .... Someone just called the cops ...
And they are fishing ?  Still closed til 12....
Brutal. I hope the MNR is paying overtime to their CO's this weekend

Haven't checked yet but they should be running in the Thames by now.  Fun way to spend a couple of hours.  I want to hit the ponds for crappie this weekend but I might check a couple of spots on the river to see what's going on...
